gobblin.converter

Class HttpJoinConverter<SI,SO,DI,DO,RQ,RP>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.converter.Converter<SI,SO,DI,DO>
      • gobblin.converter.HttpJoinConverter<SI,SO,DI,DO,RQ,RP>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecordStreamProcessor<SI,SO,DI,DO>, FinalState, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public abstract class HttpJoinConverter<SI,SO,DI,DO,RQ,RP>
extends Converter<SI,SO,DI,DO>
    This converter converts an input record (DI) to an output record (DO) which contains original input data and http request & response info. Sequence: Convert DI to HttpOperation Convert HttpOperation to RQ (by internal AsyncRequestBuilder) Execute http request, get response RP (by HttpClient) Combine info (DI, RQ, RP, status, etc..) to generate output DO

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface gobblin.records.RecordStreamProcessor
